title.value: Эффективность нового фунгицидного препарата азофос форт в системе защиты яблони
Efficiency of a new fungicidal preparation azofos fort in apple tree protection system

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Kislushko, P.M., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute of Plant Protection

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented results of studying fungicide azofos fort, 30% biological efficiency against apple scab. It is revealed, that double application of the preparation at rate 6,0 l/ha in apple tree protection system effectively constrains scab development during vegetation. Biological efficiency of the fungicide, applied in protection system against apple scab has made: on leaves - 72,2%, in standard (azofos modified, 50% s.c.,) – 66,3%; on fruit - 81,6%, in standard – 72,5%. In variant with the fungicide azofos fort, 30% s.c. the fruit preserved yield was 33,6 cwt/ha in comparison with the control and 2,7 cwt/ha in comparison with the standard, accordingly. Standard production output in the trial variant was 92,0%, in the standard - 88,0%.
